A = Pe^{rt} is the continuous version of: A = Pe^{rt} is the continuous version of interest compounding. As compounding frequency increases, (1+r/n)^{nt} → e^{rt}. This is the most efficient interest calculation.
A degree n polynomial with complex coeff: A 度 n 多项式 with 复杂 coefficients has exactly n zeros (counting multiplicity), all lying in ℂ (复杂 numbers). 实数 polynomials may have 实数 or 复杂 zeros.
A faster method for dividing polynomials: A faster 方法 对于 dividing polynomials by linear factors of the form (x - c). More efficient than long division 当 the divisor is linear. Reduces calculation and is less error-prone.
A method to find the maximum or minimum: A 方法 to find the maximum or minimum value of an objective 函数 subject to linear constraints. Used in business 对于 optimization problems.
A sum of terms with non-negative integer: A 和 of terms with non-负数 integer exponents. 度 is the highest 指数. Leading coefficient is the coefficient of the highest-度 term. Standard form arranges terms from highest to lowest 度.
A system of equations consists of two or: A system of equations consists of two or more equations with the same variables. A 解 must satisfy all equations simultaneously.
A technique to rewrite ax² + bx + c as a: A technique to rewrite ax² + bx + c as a perfect 平方 trinomial plus a 常数. This converts to 顶点 form y = a(x-h)² + k.
Acute angle between terminal side and x-: Acute angle between terminal side and x-轴. Used to find trig values 对于 any angle. Reference angle always between 0° and 90°.
Add/subtract real parts and imaginary pa: 加/减 实数 parts and imaginary parts separately. 乘 using FOIL, remembering i² = -1. 除 by multiplying by the conjugate of the 分母.
Addition: ⟨a₁, b₁⟩ + ⟨a₂, b₂⟩ = ⟨a₁+a₂,: Addition: ⟨a₁, b₁⟩ + ⟨a₂, b₂⟩ = ⟨a₁+a₂, b₁+b₂⟩ (parallelogram law). Scalar multiplication: c⟨a, b⟩ = ⟨ca, cb⟩. Dot product: u·v = |u||v|cos θ 其中 θ is angle between vectors. Also u·v = a₁a₂ + b₁b₂.
Always check for a common factor in all: Always check 对于 a common 因式分解 in all terms first. 因式分解 out the GCF; this is factoring by grouping applied to all terms.
Angles that differ by multiple of 360° (: Angles that differ by multiple of 360° (or 2π 弧度). 例子: 30°, 390°, -330° are coterminal. Coterminal angle 公式: θ + 360n° or θ + 2πn.
Arithmetic with Complex Numbers:: 算术 with 复杂 Numbers:
Arrangement of objects where ORDER MATTE: Arrangement of objects 其中 ORDER MATTERS. n! = n × (n-1) × ... × 1. Permutations of n objects taken r at a time: P(n,r) = n!/(n-r)!. 例子: arranging 3 of 5 books: P(5,3) = 5!/2! = 60.
Based on arc length. 1 radian = arc leng: Based on arc length. 1 弧度 = arc length 等于 半径. Full rotation = 2π 弧度 = 360°. Conversion: 弧度 = 度 × π/180°, 度 = 弧度 × 180°/π.
Bell curve, symmetric around mean μ. Cha: Bell curve, symmetric around mean μ. Characterized by mean and standard deviation σ. Z-score: (X - μ)/σ standardizes to N(0,1). Empirical rule: 68% within 1σ, 95% within 2σ, 99.7% within 3σ.
Between roots, the parabola is either en: Between roots, the 抛物线 is either entirely above or below the x-轴. Outside the roots, it's on the opposite side. The sign doesn't change within an interval.
Bivariate data pairs (x, y) from paired: Bivariate data pairs (x, y) from paired observations. Scatterplot shows relationship. Trendline captures general pattern. Must distinguish correlation (relationship exists) from causation (one causes other).
Bring down the first coefficient. Multip: Bring down the first coefficient. 乘 by c, 加 to the next coefficient. Repeat until all coefficients are processed. The last number is the remainder; other numbers are quotient coefficients.
C(n,r) is the coefficient in binomial ex: C(n,r) is the coefficient in binomial expansion (a+b)^n. Pascal's triangle shows these coefficients. C(n,0) = 1, C(n,n) = 1, C(n,r) = C(n,n-r).
Choosing 3 from {A,B,C,D,E}: combination: Choosing 3 from {A,B,C,D,E}: combinations give ABC, ABD, ABE, ACD, ACE, ADE, BCD, BCE, BDE, CDE (10 total). Same objects in different order → same combination but different permutations.
圆 with 半径 1, 中心 at origin. Point on 圆: (cos θ, sin θ). Angles measured counterclockwise from (1, 0). 完成 圆 = 2π 弧度. Special angles: 0, π/6, π/4, π/3, π/2, etc.
Combine like terms (same variable and ex: Combine like terms (same variable and 指数). Arrange terms in descending order. Group coefficients of each power separately.
Combined with the Rational Root Theorem,: Combined with the 有理 Root 定理, these help identify possible zeros quickly. Test candidates using synthetic division (因式分解 定理). List factors and corresponding zeros systematically.
Common angles have known exact values. s: Common angles have known exact values. sin(0) = 0, sin(π/6) = 1/2, sin(π/4) = √2/2, sin(π/3) = √3/2, sin(π/2) = 1. Cosine values reverse 对于 complement.
Complex mixture problems with three or m: 复杂 mixture problems with three or more substances. Optimization problems with multiple constraints and 实数-world parameters.
Compound interest A = P(1 + r/n)^{nt}. C: Compound interest A = P(1 + r/n)^{nt}. Continuous compounding: A = Pe^{rt}. Present value given future value. Investment problems using logarithms to 解 对于 time.
Continuous growth: A(t) = Pe^{rt}. Compo: Continuous 增长: A(t) = Pe^{rt}. Compound interest: A(t) = P(1 + r/n)^{nt}. Both are exponential models with slightly different forms.
Count sign changes in p(x) to estimate p: Count sign changes in p(x) to estimate 正数 roots. Count sign changes in p(-x) to estimate 负数 roots. Number of 实数 roots of each type is at most this count and differs by an even number.
Curves formed by intersecting plane with: Curves formed by intersecting plane with a cone. 圆: plane perpendicular to 轴. 椭圆: plane at angle. 抛物线: plane parallel to side. 双曲线: plane cuts both nappes.
Describe curve using x = f(t), y = g(t): Describe curve using x = f(t), y = g(t) 其中 t is parameter. Often t 表示 time. 例子: x = 3cos(t), y = 3sin(t), t ∈ [0, 2π] traces 圆 x² + y² = 9. Eliminates parameter to get Cartesian equation.

Determined by the degree and leading coe: Determined by the 度 and leading coefficient. 对于 very large/small x, the 多项式 behaves like its leading term ax^n. Odd 度 with 正数 a: goes from bottom-left to top-right. 负数 a: top-left to bottom-right.
Discriminant tells us about roots withou: Discriminant tells us about roots without solving. Helps predict the 绘制图像: two x-intercepts, one x-intercept, or no x-intercepts.
Distribute the negative sign to all term: Distribute the 负数 sign to all terms of the 多项式 being subtracted, 那么 combine like terms. Be careful with signs!
Does the solution make sense in context?: Does the 解 make sense in context? 对于 quantities, expect 正数 values. 对于 rates, check 如果 they're realistic. Always verify by substituting into the original problem.
Domain is all real numbers. Range depend: 定义域 is all 实数 numbers. 值域 depends on the 顶点 and direction. 如果 opens up: 值域 is [k, ∞). 如果 opens down: 值域 is (-∞, k].
Elimination is more efficient when coeff: 消元 is more efficient 当 coefficients are large or 当 代入 creates messy fractions. It avoids the need to isolate variables first.
Equations with rational expressions. Fin: Equations with 有理 expressions. Find the LCD of all denominators. 乘 every term by the LCD to clear denominators. 解 the resulting 多项式 equation. Always check 解 in the original equation.
Events A and B are dependent if P(A then: Events A and B are dependent 如果 P(A 那么 B) = P(A) · P(B|A) 其中 P(B|A) is conditional probability of B given A occurred. Drawing without replacement creates dependency.
Events A and B are independent if P(A an: Events A and B are independent 如果 P(A and B) = P(A) · P(B). One event doesn't affect the other. Examples: coin flips, die rolls.
Exponential equations: check by substitu: Exponential equations: check by substituting. Logarithmic equations: verify that arguments are 正数 (定义域 restriction of 对数). Extraneous 解 can appear 当 applying properties.
Exponential growth/decay (bacteria, inve: Exponential 增长/衰减 (bacteria, investments). Fractals and self-similar structures. Bouncing ball problems (heights form 几何 数列). Depreciation: asset value decreases by 常数 percentage.
Extend elimination and substitution meth: Extend 消元 and 代入 methods to three equations with three unknowns. Use 矩阵 notation or repeated 消元 to 解 systematically.
因式分解 all numerators and denominators. Cancel common factors. 乘 remaining numerators and denominators. Result is automatically simplified. Watch 对于 restrictions from cancelled factors.
Factor numerator and denominator complet: 因式分解 分子 and 分母 completely. Cancel common factors. Be careful: you can only cancel factors, not terms. The cancelled term 表示 the restriction on the 定义域.
Factor: sin x cos x - sin x = 0 → sin x: 因式分解: sin x cos x - sin x = 0 → sin x (cos x - 1) = 0. Quadratic 公式: 2 sin² x - sin x - 1 = 0 using 代入 u = sin x. Use identities to 简化 before solving.
Find a common denominator (usually the L: Find a common 分母 (usually the LCD). Rewrite each fraction. 加/减 numerators; 分母 stays the same. 简化 the result. Include 定义域 restrictions from both original expressions.
Find vertical asymptotes and holes. Find: Find vertical asymptotes and holes. Find horizontal asymptotes. Find x-intercepts and y-intercept. Plot several test points. Sketch smoothly, respecting asymptotes and approaching them asymptotically.
Find where revenue equals cost. Set prof: Find 其中 revenue 等于 cost. Set profit 函数 equal to 零 or set revenue equal to expense. The 交点 point is the break-even point.
Find zeros and their multiplicities. Det: Find zeros and their multiplicities. Determine end behavior. Plot a few additional points. Connect smoothly, respecting behavior at zeros.
Finding the vertex of a parabola. Verify: Finding the 顶点 of a 抛物线. Verifying 解 to quadratic equations. Converting to forms 对于 specific uses like optimization problems.
First, identify first term a and common: First, identify first term a and common ratio r. Check |r|
For a + bi, the conjugate is a - bi. Whe: 对于 a + bi, the conjugate is a - bi. 当 a 多项式 with 实数 coefficients has a 复杂 零, its conjugate is also a 零. 复杂 zeros come in conjugate pairs.
For ax² + bx + c, find two numbers that: 对于 ax² + bx + c, find two numbers that 乘 to ac and 加 to b. Use these to split the middle term, 那么 因式分解 by grouping. Alternatively, use the AC 方法.
For equations like A/B = C/D, cross-mult: 对于 equations like A/B = C/D, cross-乘: AD = BC. This shortcut is valid and often simpler than finding LCD, but still check 对于 extraneous 解.
For n(x)/d(x) where deg(n) = deg(d) + 1,: 对于 n(x)/d(x) 其中 deg(n) = deg(d) + 1, 除 to get quotient q(x) + remainder. The 渐近线 is y = q(x). As x → ±∞, the 函数 approaches this line.
For polynomial p(x) with integer coeffic: 对于 多项式 p(x) with integer coefficients, any 有理 root p/q (in lowest terms) has p dividing the 常数 term and q dividing the leading coefficient. This narrows possible 有理 zeros significantly.
Form a + bi where a and b are real and i: Form a + bi 其中 a and b are 实数 and i² = -1. 实数 part is a, imaginary part is b. 复杂 numbers extend our number system to allow nth roots of any 多项式.
Form f(x) = ab^x where a ≠ 0, b > 0, b ≠: Form f(x) = ab^x 其中 a ≠ 0, b > 0, b ≠ 1. Base b determines 增长 (b > 1) or 衰减 (0

Fractions with polynomials in numerator: Fractions with polynomials in 分子 and 分母. Form P(x)/Q(x) 其中 Q(x) ≠ 0. 定义域 excludes values making the 分母 零 (restrictions).

Functions can be combined through additi: Functions can be combined through addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. 复合 of functions (f ∘ g)(x) = f(g(x)) means apply g first, 那么 apply f to the result.
Functions of the form f(x) = ax² + bx +: Functions of the form f(x) = ax² + bx + c 其中 a ≠ 0. The 绘制图像 is a 抛物线 (U-shaped curve). The coefficient a determines the direction: a > 0 向上开口, a

Graph both inequalities on the same coor: 绘制图像 both inequalities on the same coordinate plane. The 解 region is 其中 both conditions overlap (shaded regions intersect). This creates a bounded or unbounded region.
Graph each line and find intersection po: 绘制图像 each line and find 交点 point(s). One 交点 = 唯一解. Parallel lines = 无解. Same line = infinitely many 解.
Height h(t) = -16t² + v₀t + h₀, where v₀: Height h(t) = -16t² + v₀t + h₀, 其中 v₀ is initial velocity and h₀ is initial height. The maximum height 发生在 the 顶点. Set h(t) = 0 to find 当 the object hits the ground.
Higher-degree polynomials appear in opti: Higher-度 polynomials appear in optimization in calculus. Taylor 级数 approximate functions using polynomials. Interpolation fits n points with 度 n-1 多项式.

Identify the unknowns and assign variabl: Identify the unknowns and assign variables. Translate each sentence into an equation. 对于 mixture, distance, and investment problems, organize information in a table.
Identify the variable (usually time or q: Identify the variable (usually time or quantity). Write the quadratic equation based on given information. Use the 顶点 to find maximum/minimum, or 解 equations 对于 specific outcomes.
If (x-c) appears k times in the factoriz: 如果 (x-c) appears k times in the factorization, c has multiplicity k. At an intercept with odd multiplicity, the 绘制图像 crosses the x-轴. With even multiplicity, it touches but doesn't cross.
If bases are equal, exponents are equal:: 如果 bases are equal, exponents are equal: b^m = b^n → m = n. 如果 bases aren't equal, take 对数 of both sides. Use 对数 properties to 简化.
If first event has m outcomes and second: 如果 first event has m outcomes and second event has n outcomes, total outcomes is m × n. Extends to multiple events: 乘 all possibilities. 例子: 3 appetizers, 4 mains, 2 desserts → 3 × 4 × 2 = 24 meals.
If fixed cost is F and variable cost per: 如果 fixed cost is F and variable cost per unit is v, total cost C(n) = F + vn 对于 n units. Average cost A(n) = C(n)/n = (F + vn)/n. This is a 有理 函数 with a horizontal 渐近线 at y = v.
If numerator and denominator share a fac: 如果 分子 and 分母 share a 因式分解 (x-c), both have a 零 at c. This cancels to a hole (removable discontinuity), not an 渐近线. Find the y-coordinate by evaluating the simplified 函数 at x = c.
If one person completes a job in a hours: 如果 one person completes a job in a hours and another in b hours, together they 完成 it in 1/(1/a + 1/b) hours. These lead to 有理 equations.
If r is a zero of p(x), then (x-r) is a: 如果 r is a 零 of p(x), 那么 (x-r) is a 因式分解. Zeros are x-intercepts of the 绘制图像. By the Fundamental 定理 of Algebra, a 多项式 of 度 n has n zeros (counting multiplicity).
If r ≠ 1: S_n = a_1(1 - r^n)/(1 - r) = a: 如果 r ≠ 1: S_n = a_1(1 - r^n)/(1 - r) = a_1(r^n - 1)/(r - 1). 如果 r = 1: S_n = na_1. The 公式 works even with 负数 r.
If the same variable has coefficients li: 如果 the same variable has coefficients like 2 and 3, 乘 the first equation by 3 and the second by -2 to create coefficients 6 and -6. 当 added, they cancel.
If x grams of substance are diluted in y: 如果 x grams of substance are diluted in y milliliters of liquid, concentration = x/y g/mL. Adding more liquid increases 分母, decreasing concentration. These become 有理 函数 models.
Inequalities like ax² + bx + c > 0. Firs: Inequalities like ax² + bx + c > 0. First 解 the corresponding equation ax² + bx + c = 0 to find boundary points. These boundary points 除 the number line into intervals.
Isolate the variable using inverse opera: Isolate the variable using 反函数 operations. Always perform the same operation on both sides to maintain equality. Check 解 by substituting back into the original equation.

Linear functions grow fastest for small: Linear functions grow fastest 对于 small x, but exponential eventually dominates. Logarithmic functions grow slowest. 对于 very large x: exponential > linear > logarithmic.

Many problems use C(n,r) to count favora: Many problems use C(n,r) to count favorable outcomes. 例子: probability of 2 heads in 3 coin flips: C(3,2)/2^3 = 3/8. Lottery odds: C(49,6) total combinations.
Mark the boundary point. Shade left of t: Mark the boundary point. Shade left of the point 如果 x < or x ≤, right 如果 x > or x ≥. Use open 圆 对于 strict inequalities, closed 对于 ≤/≥.

Mathematical induction foundation for ma: Mathematical induction foundation 对于 many calculus proofs and 定理 verification. Recursive functions and sequences central to analysis. The principle of induction connects to the completeness axiom in 实数 number system, essential 对于 rigorous calculus development.
Mean = 0, standard deviation = 1. Denote: Mean = 0, standard deviation = 1. Denoted Z ~ N(0,1). Z-table gives cumulative probability P(Z ≤ z). Any normal random variable can be converted to standard form: Z = (X - μ)/σ.
Medical diagnosis: likelihood of disease: Medical diagnosis: likelihood of disease given test result. Quality control: probability defective given supplier. Database queries: probability matching criteria given constraints.
Models like P(x) = kx/(1 + ax) where pro: Models like P(x) = kx/(1 + ax) 其中 productivity increases 那么 levels off. The horizontal 渐近线 k/a 表示 maximum productivity as x → ∞.
Multiply by the reciprocal: (P/Q) ÷ (R/S: 乘 by the reciprocal: (P/Q) ÷ (R/S) = (P/Q) × (S/R). 简化 as with multiplication. Important: the reciprocal's 分母 is S, which must be non-零.
Multiply one or both equations by consta: 乘 one or both equations by constants so that one variable has opposite coefficients. 加 the equations to eliminate that variable, leaving one equation with one unknown.
N(t) = N_0 e^{-μt} where λ is decay cons: N(t) = N_0 e^{-μt} 其中 λ is 衰减 常数. Relates to 半衰期: 半衰期 = ln(2)/λ. Used 对于 carbon dating and nuclear material calculations.
Natural exponential and logarithm are th: Natural exponential and 对数 are the fundamental functions in calculus. d/dx(e^x) = e^x and d/dx(ln x) = 1/x. Integration of 1/x gives ln|x|. Taylor 级数 对于 e^x, sin(x), cos(x) appear throughout calculus.
Navigation and bearings: angle measured: Navigation and bearings: angle measured from north. Height problems: angle of elevation/depression. Projectile motion: initial velocity at angle θ. Harmonic motion: position = A cos(ωt + φ).
Near vertical asymptote, function approa: Near vertical 渐近线, 函数 approaches +∞ or -∞ depending on sign of 分母 from left/right. Test points on either side to determine which direction.
Occur at x-values where denominator is z: Occur at x-values 其中 分母 is 零 (and not cancelled by 分子). These are "forbidden" x-values. 绘制图像 approaches these lines but never touches them. Plot as dashed vertical lines.
Once a_1 and d known, any term can be fo: Once a_1 and d known, any term 可以被找到: a_n = a_1 + (n-1)d. To find d: d = (a_m - a_k)/(m - k). To insert 算术 means between two terms, find common difference and generate intermediate terms.
Organize data for two categorical variab: Organize data 对于 two categorical variables. Cell entries are counts. Marginal distributions shown in totals. Conditional probabilities calculated by dividing cell by row/column total.
P(A|B) = P(A and B) / P(B). Probability: P(A|B) = P(A and B) / P(B). Probability of A given B has occurred. 分母 is not 100% but P(B). 例子: P(roll 3 | die is even) = P(3 and even) / P(even) = 0 / (1/2) = 0.

P(t) = P_0 e^{rt} (continuous) or P(t) =: P(t) = P_0 e^{rt} (continuous) or P(t) = P_0(1+r)^t (discrete). r is 增长 rate. Doubling time: 0.693/r (continuous). Applications: bacteria, human population, viral spread.
P(x)/Q(x) and [P(x) × R(x)]/[Q(x) × R(x): P(x)/Q(x) and [P(x) × R(x)]/[Q(x) × R(x)] are equivalent 有理 expressions (same 定义域 restrictions). Use this to find common denominators or create equivalent forms.
Parabola: (y-k)² = 4p(x-h) (horizontal): 抛物线: (y-k)² = 4p(x-h) (horizontal) or (x-h)² = 4p(y-k) (vertical). 顶点 (h, k), focus, 准线 p units away. 双曲线: (x-h)²/a² - (y-k)²/b² = 1 (horizontal) or reversed. Asymptotes: y - k = ±(b/a)(x - h). Eccentricity e = c/a > 1 其中 c² = a² + b².
Passes through (1, 0) because log_b(1) =: Passes through (1, 0) because log_b(1) = 0. Passes through (b, 1) because log_b(b) = 1. Increasing 如果 b > 1, decreasing 如果 0
Passwords: each position could be differ: Passwords: each position could be different letter/digit. Seating arrangements. Top finishers in race. Anagrams of words (with and without repeated letters).

Proof technique for statements about all: Proof technique 对于 statements about all 正数 integers. Two steps: (1) Base case: prove statement true 对于 n = 1. (2) Inductive 步骤: assume true 对于 n = k, prove it's true 对于 n = k+1. Proves infinitely many cases with finite work.

Selection of objects where ORDER DOESN'T: Selection of objects 其中 ORDER DOESN'T MATTER. C(n,r) = n!/(r!(n-r)!), also written "n choose r". Always C(n,r) ≤ P(n,r). 例子: choosing 3 of 5 books: C(5,3) = 5!/(3!2!) = 10.
Sequence with constant difference d betw: 数列 with 常数 difference d between consecutive terms. a_n = a_1 + (n-1)d. 例子: 2, 5, 8, 11, 14... has a_1 = 2, d = 3. The common difference can be 负数 or 零.
Sequence with constant ratio r between c: 数列 with 常数 ratio r between consecutive terms. a_n = a_1 · r^{n-1}. 例子: 2, 6, 18, 54... has a_1 = 2, r = 3. Each term is r times the previous term.
Series where consecutive terms cancel: Σ: 级数 其中 consecutive terms cancel: Σ (a_i - a_{i+1}) = a_1 - a_{n+1}. Useful 对于 partial fractions decomposition.
